website_summaries.verdict: Superbly designed charger base for the often unwieldy Wii U Pro controllers. You’ll save space and charging hassle.
pros: Lightweight yet sturdy charging base that provides rapid charging for 2 Wii U Pro controllers
Bright charging indicator over each charging slot
As a separate charging station, prevents GamePad from discharging power, which occurs when charging Pro via the Wii U console
cons: Has a manual, not automatic, on-off switch
Must place magnetic dongles (included) onto Pro controllers  in order to work

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, this is trash. It no longer will charge the paddles. It charges for a moment the shows each of the paddles as "charged." I tried to reach out to the seller and Nyko. With no progress. I would not recommend this product. ~~~ Original review~~~ Kids love the simplicity of charging these controllers! Good and easy execution. The lights are simple to understand and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: mesco

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It's almost perfect. The controllers hang onto the base with a magnet that's perfect in strength. Once attached the controllers aren't going anywhere, but still it's easy to pull one off with one hand. I haven't figured out what the light indicators mean. I have some good guesses but they appear to work inconsistently. I'm sure reading the manual would clear it up but I hate reading manuals. I always can figure out what things mean just by using them over time. But in this case I'm still somewhat puzzled. Bear in mind I've not gone out of my way to figure it out. I'm just saying I hate when it's not obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin C. Drake

customer_reviews.title: ) They snap on to the controllers semi-permanently and follow the curve of the handset nicely, and the magnetic fixture has a so
customer_reviews.text: One word of warning: The magnetic mounting clips on this stand fit *only* the official Nintendo Pro Controllers — ironically, they will NOT fit the Nyko models! (The Nyko handsets have a slightly different curvature, and the charger-cable-socket is upside-down versus the Nintendo model.) They snap on to the controllers semi-permanently and follow the curve of the handset nicely, and the magnetic fixture has a solid feel when charging. (Unlike the Nyko Wii Remote hangers, where the remotes can be knocked off pretty easily). The charger-adapter-dongle stays out of your way when playing.
customer_reviews.author: BRP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charging station
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent charger for official Nintendo-made Pro controllers. Insert the magnetic dongle into the controller's USB port, plug the charger into an electrical outlet, and you're ready to go. The controller grabs onto the base, and can be removed with two hands, or a one-handed slight twisting motion. You leave the dongle on the controller while you're playing. My kids have no issues using the unit. You can also store your controllers attached to the base without turning the base on.
customer_reviews.author: Snufalufagus

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome!!! Plug in magnetic adapter and place in stand, orange light shows its connected and charging while green light shows its charged and ready to go... love it
customer_reviews.author: Concerned consumer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but make sure the power is always on!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design choices; you can leave the magnets clipped to the controller for an incredibly convenient method to dock your controllers and it is aesthetically appealing. Unfortunately, this product has an off and on switch that does not power-on during any power outage. As a result, your Wii U Pro Controllers attached to the charging station will have dead batteries (the charge base appears to slowly drain the batteries when connected without the power on) if you didn't turn the power back on manually.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne

customer_reviews.title: Great for the official Wii U pro controllers
customer_reviews.text: Great for the official Wii U pro controllers. I have 2 and love them. The Green led light at the bottom is a bit bright but you can cover it with tape or something.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This charging base works very well charging your Wii controllers. I am very pleased with the performance the magnets are very strong. I do however have an issue with my wife calling the controllers remotes. If you are a gamer you know remotes are for the TV and controllers are for gaming systems. If you consider yourself a gamer and refer to controllers as a remotes you are not a gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: WOW! These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I may be late to this party since I just bought a second hand Wii U... but this charging base is amazing! It works better than advertised and I love not having to worry about a cable! Even my 5-year-old finds this easy to grab the controllers when needed and to place it back to charge. The magnet is plenty strong!
customer_reviews.author: werds

customer_reviews.title: Great to help keep charged
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the price. I love that its magnetic and easy for my 7 year old son to make sure its hooked up. The only thing that stinks is the charging magnets dont work for modified controllers, like our generic l.e.d. controllers, but thats ok.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMama

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, works great
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic dock function makes it easy for my kids to put the controllers on the charger. Helps the game area not look cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Angelic M Hudelson

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: The adapter that snaps onto the controller adds almost no weight to the controller. Should also prevent wearing out or damaging the mini-USB port on the controller itself, which I'm pretty sure my 5-year-old was trying to do. Charges great, and gives the kids a specific spot to keep the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Slash-2CPU

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Charge Base Pro from Nyko. It's much more simple to be able to plug in the Wii U pro controllers into a stand rather than charging the controllers while being plugged into the Wii U. I'm not sure how long it takes for a full charge, but the battery life on the pro controller is like 8-10 hours anyway. An overnight, while you sleep, charge should suffice. The Base also looks pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: tubuochen

customer_reviews.title: Yup!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says...charges with no issue, magnet holds good, unique style. No problems here!
customer_reviews.author: hyperion24

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had it terribly long but so far its nice
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it terribly long but so far its nice, does exactly what its supposed to do. I like the magnetic clip you place on the controllers. It allows them to be smoothly popped off the stand for use. No doubt this reduced wear on the controller's charge socket from continually popping the controller in and out.
customer_reviews.author: WideAndNerdy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, charges our Wii U pro controllers, and sits on the table and is handy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kurz

customer_reviews.title: it is a cool product and i like that it is connected with ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a cool product and i like that it is connected with magnets. but i regret buying it because the plugin cord didn't mach the outlet. i did however find out that i could replace it with the cord to my computer's speakers. but i didn't want to lose my sound just to recharge my controllers batteries. it is by no accords a bad produckt and could be very useful, as long as you live in USA where the outlets match, or ether you or one of your friends and family is good with electricity and know how to swarp the plug to match the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonmand55

customer_reviews.title: Study, secure, works well
customer_reviews.text: It holds two controllers well and keeps them charged. It has an on switch on top, which I find odd, and a bright green light on the bottom. There is a clear indicator for when it is charging. It's pretty sturdy. If, say your cat throws it from a windowsill to a hardwood floor it will not be damaged. My cat really needed to test that.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Reisner

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i had lost the charging wire for the pro controller and i was worried this wouldnt be as good as it sounded but I'm so happy to find that its just as great. Works like a charm and its small so i can have it out of the way while its charging or just waiting to be used. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Tokyo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand, it charges the controllers fast and I enjoy the fact that it changes colors to let you know when it is charged fully. The magnetic backing makes it easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Peete

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We have 2 chargers and these charge and keep them out of the way. I’m glad I bought this

customer_reviews.title: This charging base is really great and looks even better when controllers are on it
customer_reviews.text: This charging base is really great and looks even better when controllers are on it. Bought The Nintendo Wii U Pro By Commendable, The charging adapters attached to controllers with not problems at all.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Item works great! love how you can keep the charge nodes on and they won't interfere with how you play. The magnetic aspect of it pretty cool too.

customer_reviews.text: Best charging base ever! Keeps controllers charged and magnets are strong enough. The attachments to the controllers aren't that big, so it's still super comfy to hold.

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastically well, is beautiful to look at...
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastically well, is beautiful to look at, holds 2 original Wii U two Pro Controllers perfectly, seems by magic, and even let's me turn it off manually, easily when they are fully charged. Worth far more than $15! I would easily have paid $30 for it.

customer_reviews.title: Very Stylish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Colored lights indicate if the base is on and whether each charger is fully charged. Good value. Stand folds up so this base can be transported without breaking and makes the base quite reasonably sized.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C.

customer_reviews.title: Works for Nintendo brand pro controller
customer_reviews.text: Nintendo Wii U Pro Controller fits nice and snug into the adapter (the two little small pieces seen next to the charger). The adapter (and controller) is magnetically held onto the charge base. Takes about 2 hours to fully charge a depleted controller. ****The adapter DOES NOT fit on Nyko's Pro Commander controller. Thus, you cannot charge Nyko's Pro Commander with this charger. Not sure if any other controller brands will work****
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Base Pro for Wii U just great
customer_reviews.text: This item was received in great order, worked right from the word go, was well packed. Kids love the ease of use and has worked now for several months. Recommend this product. Shipment was in time and the item was well packed

customer_reviews.title: Great As A Supplement Or A Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find the charge cords that came with my pro controllers, so I decided to get this guy. Works flawlessly, and my controllers were charged quickly. Would definitely recommend to others.

customer_reviews.title: i love that i can leave the magnetic charger on the ...

customer_reviews.title: I buy this charger if available for all of my consoles
customer_reviews.text: My quick pros and cons for this charger for both the PS3 and Wii U versions Pros: 1. Ends the cord clutter. Controllers have a place to live. 2. The magnets do hold. The controller can be knocked off, but they do stay in place. 3. Charges completely, quickly. Cons: 1. The lights. They're really bright. I won't have a lot of cords strung out to keep all of my controllers ready, and Nyko makes the best chargers available. I've tried several other brands and not been happy like I am with these. I pick up the charger when I get the console if it's available, or I wait impatiently for it to be released if it isn't available.

The item description DOES NOT specify that the Nintendo branded Pro Controllers are the target items here, not the Nyko Pro Commander products. I've attached photos of the package, model of controllers we have, a shot of the connections, and a shot of the misaligned plug and socket.

product_meta.title: Charge Base Pro for Wii U
product_meta.description: Conveniently and quickly store and charge two Wii U Pro Controllers in a whole new way with Nyko's Charge Base Pro. Utilizing Nyko's patented magnetic USB Charge Adaptors, the Charge Base Pro allows for incredibly easy charging of 2 Pro Controllers. Simply attach the small, lightweight adaptor to the Mini USB port on the controller, and then place the controller into the magnetic charging port. The vertical and collapsible charging dock will suspend and hold the controller while charging it; No additional wires necessary. The Charge Base Pro utilizes AC power from any wall outlet for a rapid recharge faster than USB.
feature_bullets: Rapidly charges two Pro Controllers simultaneously
Store and charge your controllers in one place
Includes two magnetic USB Charge Adaptors for quick and convenient use
Plug into any wall outlet or place conveniently in an entertainment center
Powered by a standard wall plug; no USB port required
